name: Space Defense
description:
You and your space troop have a tough mission to defend Earth from an alien invasion in this epic space war. Will you be able to guide your troops to victory?

  • Test your reflexes by facing a bullet hell that gets faster and faster each stage.
  • Buy allies to help you in this frantic war.
  • Collect power-ups to help you survive.
  • Accumulate points to upgrade your spaceship
  • Dodge asteroids while facing enemies.
  • Survive for a time limit to unlock new levels.
  • Face a wide variety of enemies and powerful bosses.
